review: Honestly, I doubted a lot before buying the Chromecast, but now that I have one, is really fun, I watch YouTube videos, series and more, in my TV, just using my smartphone or tablet as a "content chooser". I really recommend this product, it worth the 35 bucks.
author: Mauricio G. Morra

review: Great little device. Now I can put all my media from my phone onto my TV easily. That includes the free movies I get from Google, the music I have, the television seasons I have, the internet pages!
author: T.O.

review: Not much to add to the other 30K+ reviews here, but this is a nice little inexpensive device that allows you to stream media over the TV. It's quick to set up, so you'll be watching in minutes.
author: SET67

review: We love chromecast! If you have netflix or hulu it's totally worth it! We actually purchased a second one to go in our other tv because we love it so much!
author: EandP

review: There is simply nothing out there quite like the Google Chromecast. review: LOVE this! It makes watching my netflix shows so much better, rather than watching on my computer! I love being able to listen to pandora or watch YouTube videos on my TV while getting ready or doing home workouts, too!
